name: Glitch Dungeon (BloodReave)
description:
Welcome to Glitch Dungeon!

This Tower Defense game was completed as part of a unity gamedev course. I learned a lot from creating this game and spent a lot of hours adding features and personalizing it to make it my own.

Thank you for trying it out, please consider leaving a rating and a comment, even if it is just some constructive criticism ;-)

Note that all assets(art, sound and music) were made by myself, with the exception of the awesome font: "Dungeon" - Created by  Dave Fabik and acquired from https://www.dafont.com/
